name: WiFi Controller ESP8266
description: INTRODUCTION: -WiFi Controller is used to send and receives messages to Arduino with ESP8266 WiFi module using TCP/IP Protocol. -To connect with device you have to add IP & PORT of device and select it.  FEATURES: - Auto connectivity with last selected device. - By, Long pressing of any button you can custom your own buttons for frequent sending of same data. - Configurable sliders. - Monitor Device responses. - Keep Screen on/off option. - Remove Ads Option.  Sliders Default Commands: - Slider 1: A0 to A255 - Slider 2: B0 to B255 - Slider 3: C0 to C255
